span.p: Tonight's Board Meeting will be streamed live on Youtube starting at 7:00 PM. Click the link to watch the Board Meeting. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8EYgy3QyxXA

a.title: Go to comments for Board Meeting

p.strong: Southern Kern Unified School District will follow the recommendation of Governor Newsom and complete the 2019-20 school year utilizing alternative teaching methods, including online distance learning in grades 3 - 12 and education packets created by our wonderful teachers in grades TK - 2.

a.title: Go to comments for Schools to Provide Distance Learning for Remainder of the School Year

span.p: Breakfast and lunch will be available beginning March 24 from 8:30 AM to 10:30 AM at TMS, WES, RES and United Street Park. Parents only need to pull up to the drop-offs to receive meals for their children ages 18 and younger. Children will receive one Free Breakfast and one free Lunch per day with one pickup time at one of the locations listed below. Read the flyer.

El desayuno y el almuerzo estarán disponibles a partir del 24 de marzo de 8:30 a.m. a 10:30 a.m.en TMS, WES y RES. Los padres solo necesitan acercarse a las paradas para recibir comidas para sus hijos menores de 18 años. Los niños recibirán un desayuno gratis y un almuerzo gratis por día con un horario de recogida en uno de los lugares enumerados a continuación. Lee el volante.

TROPICO MIDDLE SCHOOL
3180 Mojave Tropico Road

UNITED STREET PARK
1071 Royal Palm Drive

Monday – Friday
March 30th – April 9th
8:30 a.m. to 10:30 a.m.

a.title: Go to comments for Child Nutrition: Community Feeding for all children ages 18 and younger
Go to comments for Adult Education Classes are Suspended

span.p: Online Enrollment for 2020-2021 school year is open. Enroll Your Child for School: The Enrollment Office is located at the District Office: 2601 Rosamond Blvd., in the Educational Services Department.

a.title: Go to comments for Enroll Your Child for School

span.p: Rosamond High School Recieves 6 Year WASC Accreditation! Read More

a.title: Go to comments for Rosamond High School Recieves 6 Year WASC Accreditation!

span.p: Rosamond High School Water System has levels of arsenic above the drinking water standard. This is not an emergency. You do not need to use an alternative water supply i.e. bottled water. Read More

a.title: Go to comments for Rosamond School Water System

span.div: Southern Kern Unified School District is located in Rosamond, CA. The District Office is located at 2601 Rosamond Blvd, (661) 256-5000. The Southern Kern Unified School District enrolls students from Transitional Kindergarten through 12th grade. At SKUSD we educate the whole child and prepare our students for success in all areas of life. For enrollment information, call 661-256-5000 x 1150. Para información de inscriptión, llame 661-256-5000 x 1150.
